parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the requested page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the requested page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: If true, only return tasks that are not suspended (either part of a process that is not suspended or not part of a process at all). If false, only tasks that are part of suspended process instances are returned.

parameters.name: candidateOrAssigned
parameters.description: Select tasks that has been claimed or assigned to user or waiting to claim by user (candidate user or groups).

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Select tasks with the given category. Note that this is the task category, not the category of the process definition (namespace within the BPMN Xml).

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Only return tasks which are created after the given date.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Only return tasks which are created before the given date.

parameters.name: createdOn
parameters.description: Only return tasks which are created on the given date.

parameters.name: dueAfter
parameters.description: Only return tasks which are due after the given date.

parameters.name: dueBefore
parameters.description: Only return tasks which are due before the given date.

parameters.name: dueOn
parameters.description: Only return tasks which are due on the given date.

parameters.name: excludeSubTasks
parameters.description: Only return tasks that are not a subtask of another task.

parameters.name: executionId
parameters.description: Only return tasks which are part of the execution with the given id.

parameters.name: includeProcessVariables
parameters.description: Indication to include process variables in the result.

parameters.name: includeTaskLocalVariables
parameters.description: Indication to include task local variables in the result.

parameters.name: processDefinitionId
parameters.description: Only return tasks which are part of a process instance which has a process definition with the given id.

parameters.name: processDefinitionKey
parameters.description: Only return tasks which are part of a process instance which has a process definition with the given key.

parameters.name: processDefinitionKeyLike
parameters.description: Only return tasks which are part of a process instance which has a process definition with a key like the given value.

parameters.name: processDefinitionName
parameters.description: Only return tasks which are part of a process instance which has a process definition with the given name.

parameters.name: processDefinitionNameLike
parameters.description: Only return tasks which are part of a process instance which has a process definition with a name like the given value.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: Only return tasks with the given tenantId.

parameters.name: tenantIdLike
parameters.description: Only return tasks with a tenantId like the given value.

parameters.name: withoutDueDate
parameters.description: Only return tasks which don�t have a due date. The property is ignored if the value is false.

parameters.name: withoutTenantId
parameters.description: If true, only returns tasks without a tenantId set. If false, the withoutTenantId parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the requested page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.
